name: 2 Synchro Hedgehogs
description:
A pixel-art style puzzle platformer.
The level is passed when the hedgehogs collect all the apples.

Game Features

  • 2 hedgehogs move left and right in sync.
  • The hedgehog cannot jump - use bounces from enemies or other game characters.
  • The moment one hedgehog is in the tube or lands on the boat, freely control the movement of the second hedgehog.
  • When one hedgehog encounters an obstacle, the second hedgehog can continue moving if its path is free.
  • 33 levels of increasing difficulty.
  • Look for a rational and easy way to complete them!
